name: Pre-School Enrollment System Project update-class-pic.php文件目录遍历漏洞
product: ["Pre-School Enrollment System Project Pre-School Enrollment System Project 1.0"]
description: Pre-School Enrollment System Project是一个学前教育招生系统项目。Pre-School Enrollment System Project存在目录遍历漏洞，该漏洞源于文件update-class-pic.php在处理目录请求时的路径缺乏有效性检查，攻击者可利用该漏洞获取敏感信息。
solution:
目前厂商尚未发布升级程序修复该安全问题，详情见厂商官网：
https://phpgurukul.com/
